resources.string: Add the item to your house
How to connect to the tracer?
Why is my tracer not responding?
Go to the main page and select the button \'Add an item\'. Then follow the steps on that page.
If you follow the steps after pressing the \'Add an item\' button, you will have connected the tracer with your phone.

Go to the main page and click on the \'Find an item\' button and select the item you want to find. Then you only have to press the \'Search the item\' button and look for the flickering and beeping tracer.
Go to the main page and press the \'Delete an item\' button. Then select the item you want to delete and press \'Yes\' on the confirmation menu.
Most likely either the battery is empty or the tracer has been unpaired.
Open the lid of the tracer and replace the batteries.
